# Vendor

This vendor directory contains third-party software.

## doctest

The doctest directory contains doctest, the fastest feature-rich C++11/14/17/20
single-header testing framework for unit tests and TDD.

The following directories have been deleted to reduce storage consumption:

* doctest/doc/
* doctest/examples/
* doctest/scripts/data/

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016-2019 Viktor Kirilov
Download URL: https://github.com/onqtam/doctest/archive/2.3.7.tar.gz
Download date: March 31, 2020
Git commit: 7d42bd0fab6c44010c8aed9338bd02bea5feba41
License file: doctest/LICENSE.txt
License type: MIT
Location: doctest
Project URL: https://github.com/onqtam/doctest
Release URL: https://github.com/onqtam/doctest/releases/tag/2.3.7
Release date: February 24, 2020
Version: 2.3.7

## googletest

The googletest directory contains Google Test, a testing framework for C++
applications, and Google Mock, its companion mocking framework.

Copyright: Copyright 2008, Google Inc.
Download URL: https://github.com/google/googletest/archive/release-1.10.0.tar.gz
Download date: July 27, 2020
Git commit: 703bd9caab50b139428cea1aaff9974ebee5742e
License file: googletest/LICENSE, googletest/googlemock/LICENSE, googletest/googlemock/scripts/generator/LICENSE, googletest/googletest/LICENSE
License type: Apache-2.0, BSD-3-Clause
Location: googletest
Project URL: https://github.com/google/googletest
Release URL: https://github.com/google/googletest/releases/tag/release-1.10.0
Release date: October 3, 2019
Version: 1.10.0
